title: Extracting music from APK file NOT working
content:
just trying to extract music from a game called Mini TD 2.
I extracted the folder using apktool and searched for the terms: mp3, ogg, wav, music, media, song and I didn't find any music files used in the game. I find sharedassets0.resource file, but not sure what is really is.
Is it possible to extract this way? Am I missing something?

The APK file is here. APK
The extracted output from apktool is here. Output

comments.text: This game looks like created with unity framework, and all the data inside is encoded. I didn't extract such a data myself, but this tutorial looks reasonably good starting point: vg-resource.com/thread-31141.html .
